scripts.deploy:kovan:reset: NODE_ENV=kovan npm run truffle:deploy:kovan:reset && npm run export-data
scripts.deploy:develop:full:reset: NODE_ENV=develop npm run truffle:deploy:develop:reset && NODE_ENV=develop npm run truffle:deploy:develop:tokens:reset && npm run export-data
scripts.deploy:develop:reset: NODE_ENV=develop npm run truffle:deploy:develop:reset && npm run export-data
scripts.deploy:develop:tokens: NODE_ENV=develop npm run truffle:deploy:develop:tokens && npm run truffle:exec:export-addresses && npm run prettier:write:exported-data
scripts.deploy:develop:tokens:reset: NODE_ENV=develop npm run truffle:deploy:develop:tokens:reset && npm run truffle:exec:export-addresses && npm run prettier:write:exported-data
scripts.deploy:staging:tokens: NODE_ENV=staging npm run truffle:deploy:staging:tokens && npm run truffle:exec:export-addresses:staging && npm run prettier:write:exported-data
scripts.deploy:staging:tokens:reset: NODE_ENV=staging npm run truffle:deploy:staging:tokens:reset && npm run truffle:exec:export-addresses:staging && npm run prettier:write:exported-data
scripts.export-data: npm run export-data:scripts && npm run prettier:write:exported-data && npm run prettier:write:natspec-docs
scripts.mint-tokens: npm run truffle:exec:mint-bdsla && npm run truffle:exec:mint-dai
scripts.test:develop:bdsla: NODE_ENV=develop TEST_ENV=true npm run truffle:test:develop test/bdsla.test.js
scripts.test:develop:networkAnalytics: NODE_ENV=develop TEST_ENV=true npm run truffle:test:develop test/networkAnalytics.test.js
scripts.test:develop:messenger: NODE_ENV=develop TEST_ENV=true npm run test:develop test/messenger.test.js
scripts.test:develop:slaRegistry: NODE_ENV=develop TEST_ENV=true npm run truffle:test:develop test/slaRegistry.test.js
scripts.test:develop:sla: NODE_ENV=develop TEST_ENV=true npm run truffle:test:develop test/sla.test.js
scripts.test:develop:slo: NODE_ENV=develop TEST_ENV=true npm run truffle:test:develop test/slo.test.js
scripts.test:staging:bdsla: NODE_ENV=staging TEST_ENV=true npm run truffle:test:staging test/bdsla.test.js
scripts.test:staging:messenger: NODE_ENV=staging TEST_ENV=true npm run truffle:test:staging test/messenger.test.js
scripts.test:staging:sla: NODE_ENV=staging TEST_ENV=true npm run truffle:test:staging test/sla.test.js
scripts.test:staging:slaRegistry: NODE_ENV=staging TEST_ENV=true npm run truffle:test:staging test/slaRegistry.test.js
scripts.export-data:scripts: npm run truffle:compile && npm run truffle:exec:export-abis && npm run truffle:exec:export-addresses && npm run truffle:exec:create-natspec-docs
